name: Epic.Dominator_Mu_Mastery
display_help: Scirocco has taught you the ancient powers of the Mu. In their eternal struggle against the Oranbega, the Mu have unlocked many mystical powers, including their very signature crimson lightning. Now you posses these their secrets.

powers.name: Epic.Dominator_Mu_Mastery.Power_Sink
powers.display_help: Power Sink leeches energy directly from the bodies of all nearby foes, draining their Endurance. Each foe you draw energy from increases your Endurance. If there are no foes within range, you will not gain any Endurance. Recharge: Long

display_info.Effect Area: AoE â€” 10 ft. radius (10 targets max)

powers.name: Epic.Dominator_Mu_Mastery.Charged_Armor
powers.display_help: When you toggle on this power, you are surrounded in a charged field that makes you highly resistant to Smashing, Lethal and Energy damage. Recharge: Fast

display_info: 27.50% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, energy damage for 0.75s on self
23.38% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, energy damage for 0.75s on self
27.50% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 0.75s on self
23.38% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Epic.Dominator_Mu_Mastery.Ball_Lightning
powers.display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of Mu lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area of effect, and drains some Endurance from each target it hits. You must be level 41 and have Power Sink or Charged Armor before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: AoE â€” 15 ft. radius (16 targets max)

powers.name: Epic.Dominator_Mu_Mastery.Surge_of_Power
powers.display_help: When you activate this power, you transform your body into living Electricity and become extremely resistant to all damage but Psionics, and your endurance recovery is also increased. Expending all this energy will leave you exhausted, drained of all your endurance and unable to recover endurance for a short time. You must be level 41 and have Power Sink or Charged Armor before selecting this power. Recharge: Extremely Long

powers.name: Epic.Dominator_Mu_Mastery.Summon_Guardian
powers.display_help: Scirocco has shown you how to call upon a mystical Mu Guardian to assist you. The Mu pulse with the blood of their slaughtered ancestors in their veins, and are well practiced in the dark arts. Your access to this Guardian is very limited. You can only summon him once every 15 minutes and he will leave after 4 minutes, or if you exit a zone or mission. You must be level 44 and have two other Mu Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Recharge: Extremely Long
powers.display_short_help: Summon Mu Guardian: Ranged Moderate DMG(Energy)
